item.description:
@Sfacciato wrote:

[quote=“Miss Silabsoft, post:9, topic:549839”][quote author=Limits link=topic=668724.msg4472270#msg4472270 date=1423789790]

The song has been out for a while now so yeah, I’ve heard of it and used to like them A LOT. Good find and good song but this band isn’t metal, or at least I wouldn’t consider them as such.

oh i like other metal bands like three days grace and papa roach also

What teens these days think is metal is sad.
[/quote]

is this metal enough for you? https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=berzo1ocFkQ[/quote]

that’s cool but why are they speaking russian?
